author: cvernier
body:
- Introduced deltaPhi requirement for the jetFilter at HLT.
- Introduced findCSV function to include all the jets in the CSV-ordered jet collection
  Details on the VBF-HLT path are given here
  https://indico.cern.ch/event/339419/contribution/5/material/slides/1.pdf
  https://indico.cern.ch/event/339419/contribution/5/material/slides/7.pdf
  @silviodonato
title: Vbf filter 13tev
